desc:
Currently there is no separate role for MBOD capturer and MBOD verifier. They have the same role as the judgment capturer and verifier.

Please would you create two new roles in Client Central called â€œMBOD Capturerâ€ and â€œMBOD Verifierâ€.

Then once the roles have been created, please reassign the following people the correct roles.

MBOD Capturing:
Dimakatso Ndlovu
Honours Belankulu
Mzwandile Gumede
Nelisiwe Nkabinde
Sicelo Radebe
Tlangelani Rekhotso
Wandile Xulu
Yvonne Mpembe
Mpho Twala

MBOD Verification:
Dimakatso Moeketsi
Kelebogile Segage
Thakazile Ngcobo

Lastly, please make sure that the MBOD application front end auth will accept these new roles and revoke normal capturer and verifier access.
name: CW - CCW352 - Create new roles on CC for MBOD
